codes.name: 20XX Music Playlist Code, v1.1
description: Checks whether playlists are set up for certain stages or menus, and plays songs from them if present.
Runs on each major scene transition. This version of the code allows Hex Tracks to be played on any stage, without a playlist.
Hex Tracks will take priority over playlists for specific stages, but not over the global playlist, if it is set.
To set the flag/bit to use a hex track instead of the regular song, add 0x10000 to the music ID in the stage's Music Table.
